# Vignettes

These vignettes demonstrate some common use cases for LexOPS. Click on a vignette to view it.

```{r render-vignettes, include=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# run this file to re-render the vignettes (when they change)
# (issues when running with `source()`, so open file to run, rather than using this chunk)
source("render-vignettes.R", local = FALSE)
```

```{r vignettes-boxes, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
readRDS("vignettes-boxes.rds")
```
